name: Milky Way Creamery
description:
Starr is a new resident of Planet Rocky Road, and she's just gotten a part time job scooping ice cream to help pay for her astronaut school tuition. Though the job's not as straightforward as it seems... The cute creatures who inhabit Planet Rocky Road don't have a human sense of taste: they like their sweet treats to ~sound~ good! Help Starr interpret musical ice cream orders and make the most melodic treats this side of the Milky Way! 

*Note: level 4 and onwards contains glitches that will be worked out soon! sorry!

Controls:

Arrow Keys- Move

Z & X - Select/Confirm

This game was made in Pico-8 for the course CDM198 Game Platforms at UC Davis. 

Biggest thank you to the wonderful team that worked hard to make this happen!!

Credits:
